name: GLITCH (itch) (yotamco541)
description:
Help this developer fix the bugs in the code before the GameJam submission time!

It may seem as a typical platformer, but don't be so sure... Those irritating bugs might make it a bit more challenging...

Let us know what was your fastest time on the comments!! :D

CONTROLS:

Space Bar ---  pause game

Arrows on keyboard --- control your character

CREDITS

Programmer: Yotam Cohen

Graphics: Susie Altalef 

- All drawings were made from scratch in Photoshop

- All coding was made by us , as well as sound effects except for that in the Main Menu (taken from the Free Sounds Library) 

- Made in 3 days for the Ludum Dare  49 GameJam 2021.
